sect1.title: Maps
sect1.para: In the left menu you can see the list of map instances. Clicking on them, a new tab for monitoring this map instance is opened. In this tab you can monitor metrics also re-configure the map.

sect2.title: Monitoring Maps
sect2.para: In map page you can monitor instance metrics by 2 charts and 2 datatables. First data table "Memory Data Table" gives the memory metrics distributed over members. "Throughput Data Table" gives information about the operations performed on instance (get, put, remove) Each chart monitors a type data of the instance on cluster. You can change the type by clicking on chart. The possible ones are: Size, Throughput, Memory, Backup Size, Backup Memory, Hits, Locked Entries, Puts, Gets, Removes...

sect2.title: Map Browser
sect2.para: You can open "Map Browser" tool by clicking "Browse" button on map tab page. Using map browser you can reach map's entries by keys. Besides its value, extra informations such as entry's cost, expiration time is provided.

sect2.title: Map Configuration
sect2.para: You can open "Map Configuration" tool by clicking "Config" button on map tab page. This button is disabled for users with Read Only permisson for current cluster. Using map config tool you can adjust map's setting. You can change backup count, max size, max idle(seconds), eviction policy, cache value, read backup data, backup count of the current map instance.
